actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendments, S. Rept. 94-1184.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the McGee Creek project, Oklahoma.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-1184) Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the McGee Creek project, Oklahoma, for the purpose of: (1) storing, regulating, and conveying water for municipal and industrial use; (2) conserving and developing fish and wildlife resources; (3) providing recreation; (4) controlling floods; and (5) developing a wildlife management area. Authorizes the appropriation of $83,239,000 plus or minus such amounts as may be justified by reason of ordinary fluctutations in construction costs as indicated by engineering cost indexes applicable to the type of construction involved herein.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the McGee Creek project, Oklahoma.
